A ram is a male sheep. Players cannot shear rams like they can sheep; instead they can attack them.

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

  • Appearance until 5 December 2006

  • Shorn appearance until
    5 December 2006

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although a sheared ram NPC exists, players cannot shear rams. If shears are used on a ram, the chatbox message states That one looks a little too violent to shear...
